channel.title: Technology Series on Aeron's Tiny Blog.
channel.description: Recent content in Technology Series on Aeron's Tiny Blog.

item.title: An issue caused by using `series` with Multi Language and cause unexpected behavior - fixed maybe.
item.description:
First of all

Before I create a new issue or make a pull request with my code, I just want to discuss this issue first to make sure that I wasn’t misunderstanding origin code.

Cause I’m not a front-end or back-end developer, and I’m a new in IT : (

So I started a discuss in this neighborhood : )

item.title: Previews problem while running hugo server
item.description:
What happened

There’s some operation caused 404 page while running hugo server .

Once you changed categories and tags during running hugo server , browser’ll jumped to 404 page after you click the changed categories and tags.

Multiple pictures contained

item.title: Installing Bilberry Theme
item.description: You will find all information to setup this theme with your hugo site on the official Github Repository.
